on:
  push

name: Lint ghec-audit-log-cli

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version: [12.x, 13.x]

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Setup node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v1
        with:
          node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}

      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Run lint
        run: npm run lint
